Content:
## [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Core/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Core.zip) Latest Release 

﻿This module provides a shared core system for all TabletopTweaks mods, and and any third party mods wishing to use TabletopTweaks systems and utilities.
## First Party Tabletop Tweaks Mods
* [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Base/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Base.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Base](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Base).
	* Main content mod that provides numerous fixes and new content based on tabletop pathfinder.
* [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Reworks/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Reworks.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Reworks](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Reworks). 
	* Smaller side mod to provide homebrew changes to Owlcat's new creations that I personally feel missed the mark slightly.
* [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Flanking/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Flanking.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Flanking](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Flanking). 
	* Smaller side mod to provide PnP style flanking and related mechanics.

## Third Party Tabletop Tweaks Mods
* [Microscopic Content Expansion](https://github.com/alterasc/MicroscopicContentExpansion)
	* Add microscopic amount of new features. May or may not grow further in scope. The latter is more likely.
* [SparsSorcerousSundries](https://github.com/TheSparhawk/SparsSorcerousSundries/releases)
	* This module provides tabletop based fixes and new content to Wrath of the Righteous.
* [Tome of the Firebrand](https://github.com/pheonix99/TomeOfTheFirebird/releases)
	* A package of spells, feats, other abilities and some fixes.

**How to install**

1. Download and install [Unity Mod Manager](https://github.com/newman55/unity-mod-manager), make sure it is at least version 0.23.0
2. Run Unity Mod Manger and set it up to find Wrath of the Righteous
3. Download the Tabletop Tweaks mod
4. Install the mod by dragging the zip file from step 5 into the Unity Mod Manager window under the Mods tab

Acknowledgments:  

-   Pathfinder Wrath of The Righteous Discord channel members
-   @Balkoth, @Narria, @edoipi, @SpaceHamster and the rest of our great Discord modding community - help.
-   PS: Wolfie's [Modding Wiki](https://github.com/WittleWolfie/OwlcatModdingWiki/wiki) is an excellent place to start if you want to start modding on your own.
-   Join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/owlcat)
Translation:
## [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Core/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Core.zip) 最新リリース

﻿このモジュールは、すべてのTabletopTweaksモッズおよびTabletopTweaksのシステムとユーティリティを使用したいサードパーティモッズ向けに共有コアシステムを提供します。
## ファーストパーティTabletop Tweaksモッズ
* [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Base/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Base.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Base](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Base).
	* テーブルトップパスファインダーに基づく多数の修正と新コンテンツを提供するメインコンテンツモッド。
* [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Reworks/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Reworks.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Reworks](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Reworks).
	* Owlcatの新作に対して個人的にやや的外れだと感じたホームブルーチェンジを提供する小規模なサイドモッド。
* [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Flanking/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Flanking.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Flanking](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Flanking).
	* PnPスタイルの側面攻撃および関連メカニクスを提供する小規模なサイドモッド。

## サードパーティTabletop Tweaksモッズ
* [Microscopic Content Expansion](https://github.com/alterasc/MicroscopicContentExpansion)
	* ごく微小な新機能を追加。今後範囲が拡大する可能性あり。後者の方が可能性が高い。
* [SparsSorcerousSundries](https://github.com/TheSparhawk/SparsSorcerousSundries/releases)
	* Wrath of the Righteousに対してテーブルトップベースの修正と新コンテンツを提供するモジュール。
* [Tome of the Firebrand](https://github.com/pheonix99/TomeOfTheFirebird/releases)
	* 呪文、特技、その他の能力およびいくつかの修正をパッケージ化。

**インストール方法**

1. [Unity Mod Manager](https://github.com/newman55/unity-mod-manager)をダウンロードしてインストールし、バージョンが0.23.0以上であることを確認してください。
2. Unity Mod Managerを起動し、Wrath of the Righteousを認識させて設定します。
3. Tabletop Tweaksモッドをダウンロードします。
4. 5番目のステップのzipファイルをModsタブのUnity Mod Managerウィンドウにドラッグしてモッドをインストールします。

謝辞：

- Pathfinder Wrath of The Righteous Discordチャンネルのメンバー
- @Balkoth、@Narria、@edoipi、@SpaceHamsterおよび私たちの素晴らしいDiscordモッドコミュニティの皆様 - ご協力に感謝します。
- 追伸：Wolfieの[Modding Wiki](https://github.com/WittleWolfie/OwlcatModdingWiki/wiki)は、独自にモッド作成を始めたい場合に最適な出発点です。
- 私たちの[Discord](https://discord.gg/owlcat)に参加してください。
